project.title: Hofi Kolektivo - Agroforestry in Curacao
project.description:
Curacao imports nearly 80% of its food, resulting in unreliable, unhealthy, and expensive food supply chains. 

ðŸŒ± Hofi Kolektivo is a leading Agroforestry project in Curacao that supports its self-sufficiency movement and contributes to healthy communities. 

Hofi Kolektivo is managed by the Kolektivo Curacao Foundation, a local non-profit dedicated to increasing the well-being of the island through innovation. 

**Our Impact**
- 20 community work day
- 5 workshops and courses
- over 300 trees and plants from 30+ different species, including an endangered species of local Kapok. 
- hosted two community markets
- over 250 people have participated in Hofi Kolektivo
- 0.2 hectares have been restored. 

[View our Ecocert](https://www.ecocertain.xyz/hypercert/42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-51042355038140769519506191114765231718400) and [Photo library](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NhmHvzcPpi5IqJ35AASk5kowY-KfQTaV?usp=sharing) to get a deeper view of our activities and impact.

![alt text](https://www.ecocertain.xyz/_next/image?url=%2Fapi%2Fhypercert-image%2F42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-51042355038140769519506191114765231718400&w=640&q=75)

If you want to help increase the resiliency of Curacao in a nature-aligned way and contribute to Regenerative Innovations, consider donating to Hofi Kolektivo!
